title: The Wolf Pack
description: Test your knowledge of the Quileute wolves!

questions.question: What tribe do the shapeshifters belong to?
questions.explanation: The Quileute tribe has a genetic ability to transform into giant wolves to protect their people from vampires.

questions.question: Who is the Alpha of Sam's pack?
questions.explanation: Sam Uley was the first of his generation to phase and became the Alpha of the pack.

questions.question: Jacob eventually becomes an Alpha.
questions.explanation: Jacob has Alpha bloodline and eventually forms his own pack to protect Bella and the Cullens.

questions.question: What is 'imprinting'?

options.text: An unbreakable bond a wolf forms with their soulmate

questions.explanation: Imprinting is when a shapeshifter finds their soulmate and forms an unbreakable bond with them.

questions.question: Who does Sam imprint on?
questions.explanation: Sam imprints on Emily Young, which was heartbreaking because he was dating her cousin Leah at the time.

questions.question: Leah Clearwater is the first female wolf in Quileute history.
questions.explanation: Leah is the only known female shapeshifter in the tribe's history.

questions.question: What triggers the wolf transformation in young Quileutes?
questions.explanation: The gene is triggered by the proximity of vampires, which is why more wolves phased when the Cullens returned.

questions.question: Who does Jacob imprint on?
questions.explanation: Jacob imprints on Renesmee, Bella and Edward's daughter, the moment he sees her.
